subject: Sinsonn Shipping Notice #SSN2090
description_text: Hello, in order to avoid customs duties, we have shipped the Pro Plus pedals from our warehouse in Germany and the Plus X upgrade kit from China. Is this acceptable to you?

conversations.body_text:
Yes, that's fine, thank you very much!

tors. 24. jul. 2025 kl. 10.55 skrev support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com
>:

> Hello, in order to avoid customs duties, we have shipped the Pro Plus
> pedals from our warehouse in Germany and the Plus X upgrade kit from China.
> Is this acceptable to you?
>
> 1855:4206036
>
Hi Mkv2510kostya,    Okay, thank you for your quick confirmation.
